creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr
text:
The example included produces a five page document with force-page-count to odd.
Page number 4 that precedes the 'blank' uses the "last" page master. We should have.

P4 -> "rest"
P5 -> "last"

creator: guillaume.levrero@free.fr

use as a test once we fix the problem.

Vincent
